scripts.test: npm run test15 && npm run test14 && npm run test13 && npm run test12
scripts.testCassTest: npm run testkill && docker run -d --name cass-test -p80:80 cass-test && wait-on http://localhost/api/ping && npm run testCypressEdge && npm run testCypress && npm run testNode16 && npm run testNode15 && npm run testNode14 && npm run testNode13 && npm run testNode12 && npm run testkill
scripts.test15: npm run testkill && docker run -d --name cass-test -p80:80 cassproject/cass:1.5.1 && wait-on http://localhost/api/ping && npm run testCypressEdge && npm run testCypress && npm run testNode16 && npm run testNode15 && npm run testNode14 && npm run testNode13 && npm run testNode12 && npm run testkill
scripts.test14: npm run testkill && docker run -d --name cass-test -p80:80 cassproject/cass:1.4.4 && wait-on http://localhost/api/ping && npm run testCypressEdge && npm run testCypress && npm run testNode16 && npm run testNode15 && npm run testNode14 && npm run testNode13 && npm run testNode12 && npm run testkill
scripts.test13: npm run testkill && docker run -d --name cass-test -p80:80 cassproject/cass:1.3.18 && wait-on http://localhost/api/ping && npm run testCypressEdge && npm run testCypress && npm run testNode16 && npm run testNode15 && npm run testNode14 && npm run testNode13 && npm run testNode12 && npm run testkill
scripts.test12: npm run testkill && docker run -d --name cass-test -p80:80 cassproject/cass:1.2.44 && wait-on http://localhost/api/ping && npm run testCypressEdge && npm run testCypress && npm run testNode16 && npm run testNode15 && npm run testNode14 && npm run testNode13 && npm run testNode12 && npm run testkill
scripts.testkill: docker kill cass-test | exit 0 && docker rm cass-test | exit 0
scripts.testNode16: docker kill npm-cass & docker rm -f npm-cass & docker build --progress plain -f docker/node16 -t npm-cass . & docker run --network="host" --name npm-cass npm-cass
scripts.testNode15: docker kill npm-cass & docker rm -f npm-cass & docker build --progress plain -f docker/node15 -t npm-cass . & docker run --network="host" --name npm-cass npm-cass
scripts.testNode14: docker kill npm-cass & docker rm -f npm-cass & docker build --progress plain -f docker/node14 -t npm-cass . & docker run --network="host" --name npm-cass npm-cass
scripts.testNode13: docker kill npm-cass & docker rm -f npm-cass & docker build --progress plain -f docker/node13 -t npm-cass . & docker run --network="host" --name npm-cass npm-cass
scripts.testNode12: docker kill npm-cass & docker rm -f npm-cass & docker build --progress plain -f docker/node12 -t npm-cass . & docker run --network="host" --name npm-cass npm-cass
scripts.testCypress: docker kill npm-cass & docker rm -f npm-cass & docker build --progress plain -f docker/cypress -t npm-cass . & docker run --network="host" --name npm-cass npm-cass
scripts.testCypressEdge: docker kill npm-cass & docker rm -f npm-cass & docker build --progress plain -f docker/cypressEdge -t npm-cass . & docker run --network="host" --name npm-cass npm-cass
scripts.docs: npm install yuidocjs yuidoc-ember-cli-theme && yuidoc -c yuidoc.json -o docs -e .js src && npm remove yuidocjs yuidoc-ember-cli-theme
scripts.doclint: npm install yuidocjs yuidoc-ember-cli-theme && yuidoc --lint -c yuidoc.json -o docs -e .js src
